                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 start -->
                                <div class="user-downed-fold">
                                    <i class="icon-info-mark-o"></i>该评论被折叠
                                </div>
                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 end -->
                                <div class="content-operation"> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class content-operation -->
                                
                                                                        <!-- 点赞 -->
                                    <!-- 点赞后嵌套 class red -->
                                    <div class="J_zan comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan" id="cdc_support_344333105" data-item="3, 1, 344333105, 145392249, 344333105">
                                        <span></span>
                                        <i class="icon-thumb-up-o-thin"></i>
                                        <!-- 已点赞 -->

                                    <div class="J_cai comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan ">
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i> -->
                                        <!-- 已点踩 -->
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down"></i> -->

                                </form>

                                <div class="content-info"> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class content-info -->
                                    <span>13小时前</span>

                                        <span>辽宁</span>

                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 start -->

                                    <i class="icon-info-mark-o"></i>该评论被折叠
                                </div>
                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 end -->

                                    <div class="J_zan comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan" id="cdc_support_344337902" data-item="3, 1, 344337902, 145392249, 344337902">

                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i> -->

                                                    </h4>
                                                    <!-- 回复者 作者标识 -->
                                                                                                        <i class="icon-video"></i>
                                                    <!-- 被回复者 昵称 -->
                                                    <h4 class="receive-name">
                                                        <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/member/4284243260/pinglun" target="_blank">值友5153824991</a>
                                                    </h4>
                                                    <!-- 被回复者 作者标识 -->
                                                                                                    </div>
                                                <!-- 浮层 -->
                                                <div id="actionBox">
                                                    <i class="J_more icon-more action-sheet-icon"></i>
                                                    <div class="action-sheet">
                                                        <!-- 举报功能 cid为id里的数字 接口user/comment/ajax_comment_report-->
                                                        <a class="jubao" href="javascript:void(0);" id="report_344334011" style="display:inline-block">举报</a>
                                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                                                                                                            </div>
                                                </div>
                                            </div>
                                            <!-- 评论内容 -->
                                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment">
                                                <span>点右下角直达链接</span>
                                                <!-- radio_3_4 宽高比例3:4 -->
                                                <!-- data-radio值 0 4:3，  1 1:1，  2 3:4 -->
                                                                                                                                                                                            </div>
                                            <!-- 用户信息 及点赞操作 -->
                                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info">
                                                <div class="content-info"> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class content-info -->
                                                    <span>14小时前</span>
                                                                                                            <span>·</span>
                                                        <span>福建</span>
                                                                                                    </div>
                                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 start -->
                                                <div class="user-downed-fold">
                                                    <i class="icon-info-mark-o"></i>该评论被折叠
                                                </div>
                                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 end -->
                                                <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info-child content-operation"> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class content-operation -->
                                                
                                                                                                        <div class="J_zan comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan" id="cdc_support_344334011" data-item="3, 1, 344334011, 145392249, 344334011">
                                                        <span></span>
                                                        <i class="icon-thumb-up-o-thin"></i>
                                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-up"></i> -->
                                                    </div>

                                                    <div class="J_cai comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan ">
                                                        <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i>                                                        <!--FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 取消点踩提示 start -->
